name: Assassin's Sheep
description:
Retired Ezio Auditore takes care of his sheep. Or rather, his lively dog does. 

Flick your dog around and get the sheep rolling, gathering points for each rolling sheep. Beat your highscore until the dog runs out of bones!

Developed during the Berlin Ubisoft Game Jam 2019 by:

Julian Dietz - Programming, Sound
Paul Schnepf - Programming, UI
Peko Lin - Art
Timo Falcke - Art, Programming
